meanings.definition: A collection of recordings, typically in the form of a CD or vinyl record.
meanings.sent1: I love listening to my favorite albums on long car rides.
meanings.sent2: She has a shelf full of albums from different artists.
meanings.sent3: The albums on the shelf started singing when no one was looking!
meanings.sent4: His music taste is like a treasure chest full of albums waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The albums in his collection tell stories of different emotions and experiences.

meanings.definition: A book with blank pages for the insertion and preservation of collections, such as photographs or stamps.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother keeps her old photographs in beautiful albums.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new album to store my postcards from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The album on the table whispered to the photo frames, 'I have more space for memories!'
meanings.sent4: Her album of memories is a garden where each photo is a blooming flower.
meanings.sent5: The album's pages are like open arms, ready to embrace new memories.
